title: 求助,我的世界1.13加了高清修复就大不开了，怎么解决？
author: mcxiaokun233wow
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Tollainmear 于 2019-3-27 13:52 编辑 

就是这个：Command: "C:\\Program Files\\Java\\jre1.8.0_191\\bin\\java.exe" -Dminecraft.client.jar=.minecraft\versions\1.13\1.13.jar -XX:+UnlockExperimentalVMOptions -XX:+UseG1GC -XX:G1NewSizePercent=20 -XX:G1ReservePercent=20 -XX:MaxGCPauseMillis=50 -XX:G1HeapRegionSize=16M -XX:-UseAdaptiveSizePolicy -XX:-OmitStackTraceInFastThrow -Xmn128m -Xss1M -Xmx1024m -Dfml.ignoreInvalidMinecraftCertificates=true -Dfml.ignorePatchDiscrepancies=true -XX:HeapDumpPath=MojangTricksIntelDriversForPerformance_javaw.exe_minecraft.exe.heapdump -Djava.library.path=C:\Users\KONGJI~1\AppData\Local\Temp\minecraft3510306318438064689 -Dminecraft.launcher.brand=HMCL -Dminecraft.launcher.version=3.2.112 -cp replies.author: 帕帕武
replies.txt_content:
mcxiaokun233wow 发表于 2019-3-27 16:52
没有加forge，就是hellominecraft启动器自动安装的OptiFine
我连HCML安装的高清修复也一样崩溃
加不了光影好难受的 只能用原版的了

replies.author: Freez！流年
replies.txt_content: 尝试更换forge版本。还有现在高清修复支持1.3？

replies.author: 帕帕武
replies.txt_content:
1.13暂时不支持高清修复MOD
只能在原版核心中安装高清修复补丁

replies.author: mcxiaokun233wow
replies.txt_content:
g530775 发表于 2019-3-26 19:18
1.13暂时不支持高清修复MOD
